item.title: Week 1 - Getting Started!
item.description:
Project Context

At the beginning of this project, I struggled more than expected with where to start.
Not because the system iteslf was complex, but because I tried to design everything at once, that means:

  • Entities
  • Architecture
  • Relations
  • Future features
  • And exam requirements This week became less about building features and more about learning how to start a backend project properly.
